alert.note: Alert for Abbeville; Greenville; Greenwood; Laurens; Spartanburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 04 at 8:02AM EST until January 04 at 8:45AM EST by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: The National Weather Service in Greenville-Spartanburg has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Laurens County in Upstate South Carolina... Southeastern Greenville County in Upstate South Carolina... Southeastern Spartanburg County in Upstate South Carolina... Northeastern Abbeville County in Upstate South Carolina... Northwestern Greenwood County in Upstate South Carolina... * Until 845 AM EST. * At 802 AM EST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Laurens, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Laurens, Clinton, Ware Shoals, Gray Court, Princeton, Cross Anchor, Enoree, Hickory Tavern, Ora and Shoals Junction. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Please report damaging winds, hail, or flooding to the National Weather Service by calling toll free, 1, 800, 2 6 7, 8 1 0 1, or by posting on our Facebook page, or Tweet it using hashtag nwsgsp. Your message should describe the event and the specific location where it occurred.
